name: Draw and Junction
entries: Beginning at 10th level you new ways to fire your Gunblade:

entries.name: Danger Zone
entries: As an action on your turn, you may expend any number of cartridges from your Gunblade, creating an explosion centered on you with a 10ft radius. All other creatures in range must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC is equal to 8 + Prof + Dex), taking 2d8 Fire damage for each cartridge spent on a failure, and half as much on a success.

entries.name: Royal Guard
entries: When you or an ally within your reach or the short range of your weapon takes damage, you can use your reaction to expend a bullet to reinforce the creatures body. The creature takes reduced damage from that source equal to a roll of your Burst Strike + your Proficiency Bonus.
